subcategories.name: Standard Seat
subcategories.description:
By seat we mean how many it can sit, not cushion
                    necessarily. 1 cushion that seats 3 would be billed for 3 so
                    please specify how many persons can sit. Arm chairs and sofa
                    chairs are considered 1 seat
